name: Cookie Consent Standards
description: Standards for cookie consent implementation and compliance

seo.title: Cookie Consent Standards v1.0.0 | lksy.org
seo.description: 12 cookie consent standards for GDPR and ePrivacy Directive compliance.

checks.name: Consent Banner Present
checks.description: Verify cookie consent banner is displayed on first visit
checks.rationale: Required by ePrivacy Directive and GDPR

checks.name: Consent Before Cookies
checks.description: Verify no non-essential cookies are set before consent
checks.rationale: Required by GDPR - consent must be obtained first

checks.name: Granular Consent Options
checks.description: Verify users can consent to different cookie categories separately
checks.rationale: Required by GDPR - consent must be granular

checks.name: Cookie Policy Link
checks.description: Verify link to cookie policy is present in banner

checks.name: Accept/Reject Buttons
checks.description: Verify both Accept and Reject buttons are present
checks.rationale: Required by GDPR - users must be able to reject

checks.name: Consent Storage
checks.description: Verify consent choice is stored and respected
checks.rationale: Consent must be remembered and respected

checks.name: Withdraw Consent
checks.description: Verify users can withdraw consent easily
checks.rationale: Required by GDPR - consent must be withdrawable

checks.name: Essential Cookies Only
checks.description: Verify only essential cookies are set without consent

checks.name: Third-Party Cookie Disclosure
checks.description: Verify all third-party cookies are disclosed
checks.rationale: Required by GDPR - users must know who sets cookies

checks.name: Cookie Categories
checks.description: Verify cookies are categorized (essential, analytics, marketing, etc.)
checks.rationale: Categorization helps users understand cookie purposes

checks.name: Cookie Duration Disclosure
checks.rationale: Users should know how long cookies persist

checks.name: No Dark Patterns
checks.description: Verify no dark patterns (pre-checked boxes, misleading text)
checks.rationale: Dark patterns violate GDPR consent requirements
